options.content: *This dashboard displays federated views of all members of clusters.*

panels.description: Number of backup entries held by the member
panels.title: Multi Maps: Backup Entries

panels.description: Memory cost of owned multimap entries on this member
panels.title: Multi Maps: Entry Memory

panels.description: Memory cost of backup entries in this member
panels.title: Multi Maps: Backup Memory

panels.description: Number of hits (reads) of the locally owned entries
panels.title: Multi Maps: Hits

panels.description: Number of local events received
panels.title: Multi Maps: Events

panels.description: Number of expirations happened on locally owned entries, backups are not included
panels.title: Multi Maps: Expirations

panels.description: Number of evictions happened on locally owned entries, backups are not included
panels.title: Multi Maps: Evictions

panels.description: Number of local queries executed on the multimap (it may be imprecise for queries involving partition predicates (PartitionPredicate) on the off-heap storage)
panels.title: Multi Maps: Query Count

panels.description: Total number of indexed local queries performed on the multimap
panels.title: Multi Maps: Indexed Query Count

panels.description: Total number of other operations performed on this member
panels.title: Multi Maps: Other Operations

panels.description: Total heap cost of the Merkle trees used
panels.title: Multi Maps:  Merkle Trees Used Heap (WAN)

panels.description: Number of locked entries that the member owns
panels.title: Multi Maps: Locked Entries

panels.description: Number of updated but not persisted yet entries, dirty entries, that the member owns
panels.title: Multi Maps: Dirty Entries

panels.description: Number of local put operations on the multimap
panels.title: Multi Maps: Put Count

panels.description: Number of local set operations on the multimap
panels.title: Multi Maps: Set Count

panels.description: Number of local get operations on the multimap
panels.title: Multi Maps: Get Count

panels.description: Number of local remove operations on the multimap
panels.title: Multi Maps: Remove Count

panels.description: Maximum latency of local put operations
panels.title: Replicated Maps: Total Put Latency

panels.description: Maximum latency of local set operations
panels.title: Replicated Maps: Total Set Latency

panels.description: Maximum latency of local get operations
panels.title: Replicated Maps: Total Get Latency

panels.description: Maximum latency of local remove operations
panels.title: Replicated Maps: Total Remove Latency
